original_text: For I have told him that I will judge his house for ever for the iniquity which he knoweth; because his sons made themselves vile, and he restrained them not.
korean_text: 내가 그의 집을 영원토록 심판하겠다고 그에게 말한 것은 그가 아는 죄악 때문이니 이는 그가 자기의 아들들이 저주를 자청하되 금하지 아니하였음이니라

sentences.original_text: that I will judge his house for ever
for the iniquity which he knoweth
because his sons made themselves vile
